text: Kevin John Cramer (born January 21, 1961) is an American politician of the Republican Party. He is the junior United States senator of North Dakota since January 3, 2019. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives for North Dakota from January 3, 2013 to January 3, 2019. == References == ==Other websites== * Official U.S. House website Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:United States senators from North Dakota Category:United States representatives from North Dakota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Kevin Cramer
